Methods

| Edit this page View Source

ApplyMigrationsAsync(CancellationToken)

Applies all pending migrations to the connected SQLite database. The method wraps migration execution in a transaction ensuring that either all migrations succeed or none are applied.

Declaration
public Task ApplyMigrationsAsync(CancellationToken ct = default)
Parameters
Type Name Description
CancellationToken ct

Token used to cancel the asynchronous operation.
Returns
Type Description
Task
| Edit this page View Source

GetPendingMigrationsAsync(CancellationToken)

Retrieves the identifiers of migrations that have not yet been applied to the database in the format "Version_Name".

Declaration

Returns
Type Description
Task<string[]>

An array of pending migration identifiers.

HasPendingMigrationsAsync(CancellationToken)

Determines whether there are migrations in the assembly that have not yet been applied to the database.

Declaration
public Task<bool> HasPendingMigrationsAsync(CancellationToken ct = default)
Parameters
Type Name Description
CancellationToken ct

Token used to cancel the asynchronous operation.
Returns
Type Description
Task<bool>

true if migrations are pending; otherwise, false.
